remarks: Property of a magma homomorphism.  (Contributed by AV, 25-Feb-2020.)
statement:
ismgmhm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
ismgmhm.c $e |- C = ( Base ` T ) $.
ismgmhm.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` S ) $.
ismgmhm.q $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` T ) $.
ismgmhm $p |- ( F e. ( S MgmHom T ) <-> ( ( S e. Mgm /\ T e. Mgm ) /\ ( F : B --> C /\ A. x e. B A. y e. B ( F ` ( x .+ y ) ) = ( ( F ` x ) .+^ ( F ` y ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d T x y $.
